name: Aya's Souls - Skeleton's Revenge
description:
Hello, thank you for visiting my game page. I want to let you know a few things before you proceed:

  1. Game still under development
  2. Your donation is very welcome.
  3. Just a little piece of the game with some enemies.
  4. there may be bugs
  5. Game is already well developed, just missing the creation of the rest of the rooms (95 in total) and bosses, as well as several backgrounds

Knowing that, don't be cursing other people's projects, and understand that indie games are often not made by a team, as well as several dev's, I'm also working alone on this game.

If you are interested, and know how to work with gdevelop, Tiled, and want to help in any way, please do not hesitate to contact me!

Attention for the Linux version

It may be that the Linux version doesn't run very well on your computer, because the Electron version that GDevelop uses is old, although I'm using the new one to run on my machine. So, if it crashes, or there is a lot of lag in the game, be aware that it is for this reason

If the Windows version is in the same situation, please contact me.

Dev page:  https://forum.gdevelop.io/t/my-game-a-little-about-development/31980

Buy me a Coffe? buymeacoffee.com/?via=project89
